title: Revitalizing maize growth and yield in water-limited environments through silicon and zinc foliar applications

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Sobhi F. Lamlom, Ahmed M. Abdelghany, Honglei Ren, Hayssam M. Ali, Muhammad Usman, Hiba Shaghaleh, Yousef Alhaj Hamoud, Gawhara A. El-Sorady
